channel.title: Tavlonia (STABLE - NO DUPES)
channel.description:
After Rene tried to Rat his whole server, it went down hill. I worked on Tavlonia, along with Notepad, Jordon, and Vain. This is the newest version of Tavlonia which is extremely stable and has every dupe fixed. [b]If your looking to use a PI server, you should use this.[/b] The server is setup to have a great economy and has every minigame and skill working. There are lot's of bosses to fight too.
Why is the server called Rune MTP in the download? This server was originally Tavlonia, but I hosted it for a short period under the name Rune MTP.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2q19nhi.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/33lgot0.jpg[/img]
CLIENT: http://uppit.com/kzakjsqudlln/Rune-MTP_open_source_client.rar SERVER: http://uppit.com/681azt6n8w2w/rune_mtp_317_aka_Tavlonia.rar

item.title: Tavlonia (STABLE - NO DUPES)
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Rene wasn’t the one who RATTED a lot of people, and it’s not our problem. You still have no right to release this, let alone from one of the owners if not Rene, and I certainly didn’t give you permission.

It’s not anyone’s right to release this, but someone had to do it. I didn’t want to but Notepad told me to. If you would rather release something then go for it. Either way you didn’t work on this, so don’t act like your big shit being an owner on a server that ratted their players and then started under a new name. And yes, Rene was the one who ratted the people. There’s more evidence pointing to it than him being innocent.

ill just tell a mod to remove this because it’s shit either way, people aren’t even downloading.

Read full topic

Rene never denied what he said to me on msn. “Is that a rat?” Rene - “Yes, FUD”

I believe still 100% that it was Rene. His story doesn’t match up. I wouldn’t have released this again if Notepad didn’t tell me to. A lot of people put effort into this and I know way claim it to be just mine.
